Sentencas: Uncovering microstructure evolution mechanisms that accompany the long-term operation of solid oxide fuel cells is a fundamental challenge in designing a more durable energy system for the future.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell anodes characterized by persistent homology

Sentencas: To date, the study of fuel cell stack degradation has focused mainly on electrochemical performance and, more rarely, on averaged microstructural parameters.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell anodes characterized by persistent homology

Sentencas: Here we show an alternative approach in which an evolution of three-dimensional microstructural features is studied using electron tomography coupled with topological data analysis.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell anodes characterized by persistent homology

Sentencas: The latter produces persistent diagrams of microstructure before and after long-term operation of electrodes.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell anodes characterized by persistent homology

Sentencas: Those diagrams unveil a new insight into the degradation process of three involved phases: Nickel, pores, and yttrium-stabilized zirconium.
Titulo: Microstructure evolution of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell anodes characterized by persistent homology
